name: CR Item Masters
query:
SELECT
`tabItem`.process_no as "Process No:Data:80",
`tabItem`.name as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
`tabItem`.item_name as "Item Name:Data:270",
`tabItem`.rollon_code as "ROLLON Code:Data:130",
`tabItem`.item_group as "Item Group:Data:130"

FROM
`tabItem`

ORDER BY `tabItem`.rollon_code DESC, `tabItem`.process_no DESC
